metadata.Title: CVE-2018-20763 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
In GPAC 0.7.1 and earlier, gf_text_get_utf8_line inmedia_tools/text_import.c in libgpac_static.a allows an out-of-bounds writebecause of missing szLineConv bounds checking.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-20763` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gpac - 0.5.2-426-gc5ad4e4+dfsg5-3ubuntu0.1
gpac-modules-base - 0.5.2-426-gc5ad4e4+dfsg5-3ubuntu0.1
libgpac4 - 0.5.2-426-gc5ad4e4+dfsg5-3ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gpac package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.5.2-426-gc5ad4e4+dfsg5-3ubuntu0.1').
